useCase.name: Add Building Data
useCase.description: User adds building data for the new construction project.

preconditions.precondition: User is logged in and has access to the building data management system.

successEndConditions.condition: Data of the map is successfully shown to the user.

useCase.trigger: User initiates the node edition process in the UI.

mainSequence.step: User starts the node edition process.
User requests data (building code, floor number, width, height, map, rooms, passageways, elevator).
User inserts the data (building code, floor number, width, height, map, rooms, passageways, elevator).
Shows data of the map to the user.
